description: At the height of Egypt's new kingdom, the most powerful Pharaohs who ever lived were buried in tombs full of gold, a divine metal which was regarded as the flesh of the gods. Where did this wealth come from and how did Egypt becom...
name: Egypt

review.name: Incredible
review.reviewBody:
I feel it is a documentary unmatched, I wish I was able enough to write a review that does justice to this documentary series. Watch it, you will be captivated. The soundtrack and images are beautiful, and I feel the way the story is built fits perfectly. It is very informative, and many experts and archeological sites are visited as well.

The narration isn't modern, but it works with the topic of the documentary, frankly I like the style better compared to contemporary documentaries, and reminds me a bit of the narration in the documentary Stalingrad from 2003.

Who were these mysterious Egyptians? And what do they mean to us still? You will see.
